file_content.text: You have served the Empire well.
Corellia's future lies with the Empire.
Darth Charnus awaits your company.
The pleasure of your arrival was expected, my lord.
The Empire's top operative arrives--just as expected.
We knew the hunt would bring you here.
You are expected. And I must say, it's an honor.
Welcome to Corellia. I am Lord Feras, here to make a request on behalf of my master.
Darth Decimus of the Dark Council has taken interest in your actions and desires your assistance in the battle for Corellia.
I don't help any Dark Council member who's a friend of Darth Baras.
Depends on his affiliations.
Baras is no friend--my master sought you for a reason.
I could use more Dark Council allies, but not if they're allied with Thanaton.
Depends on his affiliations.
Darth Decimus shares your distaste for Thanaton, which is why he extends this offer.
This won't be the first time I've helped a member of the Emperor's inner circle.
I always oblige the council.
My master is aware of your service to Darth Jadus. That is why he sent me to find you.
If this Dark Council member wants my expertise, he'll have it.
I will oblige.
Intelligence has never produced a finer operative. Perfect for the situation at hand.
If there's a battle raging and credits to be made, I'm there.
Count me in.
Darth Decimus was wise to single you out, hunter.
What's this about a battle?
Spare me the pleasantries.
Our invasion of Corellia was executed to perfection, but the ensuing occupation has met... difficulties.
Darth Decimus believes you can help. If you're interested, seek out his servant: Darth Charnus. He will set you on the path of conquering Corellia.
I'll talk with Darth Charnus at once.
So be it.
Who is Darth Charnus?
Darth Charnus?
The Imperial authority on Incorporation Island. For now, he is the closest you'll get to Darth Decimus.
Uh-huh. Sure, he will.
Do not risk angering Darth Decimus. Seek out his apprentice soon.
Darth Charnus's ship, the Tears of Taris, is on Corellia now. A private shuttle outside the spaceport will take you there.
I have no business with you.
